properties.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
properties.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued January 12 at 3:40AM PST until January 13 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts to 35 mph expected.
Waves 1 to 3 feet.

* WHERE...Pyramid Lake.

* WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 7 AM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone
to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until
conditions improve.
properties.instruction:
Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a
sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing
boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

NWSheadline: LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM PST MONDAY FOR PYRAMID LAKE
